EmailTemplate.name: 2024 - Jerry visits AR
EmailTemplate.subject: On-Site in {!Contact.MailingCity}: Schedule a Face-to-Face Meeting!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello! Our modular expert, Jerry Schultz, will be in {!Contact.MailingCity}, AR on Friday, August 30th. If {!Account.Name} has any upcoming needs, he would love to stop by for a face-to-face meeting to discuss how our modular building solutions can support your goals.
To connect with Jerry Schultz:
--> Reply to this email
--> Call 504-201-4006
We are here to help!
